law.catch_line: Obtaining trees to carry out KRS 176.053.
law.text: The Energy and Environment Cabinet shall furnish to the Department of Highways such seedlings or young trees as the department may require, or as may be available. The Department of Highways shall pay to the Energy and Environment Cabinet the reasonable value thereof as may be agreed upon between such departments.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 230, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 3.
